welcome_message:
👋 Welcome to our bot, dear user!

With this bot, you can access useful features to manage your tasks and get updates. Use the /help command to see the list of available commands.
help_message:
Here are the available commands you can use:

/start - Restart the bot and see the welcome message
/help - Get a list of available commands
/language - Change the bot's language
/admin - Access the admin panel (for admins only)

Feel free to explore the bot!
